channel.title: You win an award
channel.description: I was thinking, if there was a rule, where if your award was damaged or tainted, for instance, you win an award for fattest person on earth and you lose weight, therefor you lose your award. Say you won an award for not winning an award, you end up winning a reward, so you lose it. But then you get it back, but then you lose it. So what would happen.

item.title: You win an award
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:

[quote=“the fu superior, post:8, topic:202109”][quote author=Mr.Chris link=topic=266771.msg2203837#msg2203837 date=1209086509]
wtf have you been smoking you crazy crack whore.
[/quote]
Hweed. (Put more of an H sound before the w, just to piss people off)[/quote]
Cool hwhip?
We were discussing this during free block at school yesterday.

item.title: You win an award

item.description:
@ThatOneServer wrote:

[quote=“the fu superior, post:1, topic:202109”]I was thinking, if there was a rule, where if your award was damaged or tainted, for instance, you win an award for fattest person on earth and you lose weight, therefor you lose your award.
Say you won an award for not winning an award, you end up winning a reward, so you lose it. But then you get it back, but then you lose it.
So what would happen.[/quote]
paradox…

What the fuck do you think would happen… There wouldn’t be an award.

item.title: You win an award
item.dc:creator: @chrisn2323 chrisn2323
item.description:
@chrisn2323 wrote:

[quote=“the fu superior, post:1, topic:202109”]I was thinking, if there was a rule, where if your award was damaged or tainted, for instance, you win an award for fattest person on earth and you lose weight, therefor you lose your award.
Say you won an award for not winning an award, you end up winning a reward, so you lose it. But then you get it back, but then you lose it.
So what would happen.[/quote]
Well, you could have “fattest person of 2007” and it would still apply if you weren’t fat anymore because you were the fattest at the time. Although if it was the fattest person, then you would lose your title if someone passed you in fatness.

Why did you that?

Read full topic
